LanguageData.Imprisoned.label: imprisoned
LanguageData.SharedBedroom.label: sharing bedroom
LanguageData.SharedBedroom.description: Sharing a room with others is annoying. I want some privacy.
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied.label: colonist left unburied
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied.description: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. Nobody should be left like that. People deserve a decent burial.
LanguageData.HappyNude.label: happily nude
LanguageData.HappyNude.description: I'm nude and loving it! I feel so free and unconstrained and in touch with my surroundings!
LanguageData.Naked.label: naked
LanguageData.MasochistLittlePain.label: in a little pain
LanguageData.MasochistLittlePain.description: Ow... Heh heh heh... I could get used to this!
LanguageData.MasochistMediumPain.label: in a moderate amount of pain
LanguageData.MasochistMediumPain.description: Ughhh... It hurts, but I love it! Keep it coming!
LanguageData.MasochistSeverePain.label: experiencing acute pain
LanguageData.MasochistSeverePain.description: Ouch... I think something's broken... But what an exquisite feeling!
LanguageData.MasochistInShock.label: in shock from exceptional pain
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.label: has a bionic bodypart
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.description: I'm a product of modern technology! I can do everything better!
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.label: has a bionic bodypart
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.description: They turned me into a technological abomination... If only they had given me a choice...
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.label: brawler has ranged weapon
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.description: Gah! I hate shooting from a distance. I want to get up close and personal!
